title: Eternal Winter: Lost Cities
description: Melania Blacke has always lived a perfectly normal life until she starts to dream of a place that doesn't exist. Plagued by these visions of a world she is dying to understand, Mel seeks out answers. Consumed by her need to discover this lost realm, Mel begins to alienate herself, causing her childhood best friend Jonathan Dale to worry. At first, it all seems like fantasy, until Mel and Jon are faced with the harsh reality. The world Lelendia that Mel dreams of is real, and surprisingly, Lelendia needs her help. Together with two unlikely allies, Alice and Evan, Mel and Jon set out to enter this new world, and start an adventure filled with war, confusion, majesty, and love.
author: Corinne Banning
